code:
gantt
    title A Gantt Diagram Excluding Fri - Sat weekends
    dateFormat YYYY-MM-DD
    excludes weekends
    weekend friday
    section Section
        A task          :a1, 2024-01-01, 30d
        Another task    :after a1, 20d
repo_description: A naive Rust port of mermaid-js/mermaid-cli, a command-line tool for the Mermaid
